Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Southbound Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: SB 156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 1#56 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont rrtd EB via Blmnt, Hlstd, Addison, In. Lk Shore Dr & Sheridan: WB via Blmnt, In. Lk Shore Dr, Addison, Hlstd & Blmnt due to blockage nr Blmnt/Hudson

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan
  • Westbound buses will operate via Belmont, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Addison, Halsted and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Howard-bound service is not affected.
